message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I believe this is a fair price given its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price given the product's value to me.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, $7,500 is significantly lower than my minimum expectation. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $9,000.  This still gives you a good deal, and I believe we can finalize this in a mutually beneficial way.
I'm still a bit higher than $9,000, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8,500. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll be getting from the product.
